summary: KEY STUCK IN IGNITION! THE KEY KEEPS GETTING STUCK IN ON POSITION IN THE IGNITION SWITCH AFTER COMING TO A STOP. AN EXCESSIVE AMOUNT OF WIGGLING, TURNING, PULLING OR JERKING WILL EVENTUALLY MOVE THE KEY TO THE OFF POSITION. SOMETIMES IT TAKE UP TO 20 MINUTES BY A STRONG PERSON TO ACCOMPLISH THIS TASK. ALTHOUGH THIS CAR IS OUT OF WARRANTY HOWEVER THIS IS A KNOWN ISSUE AND VW IS AWARE OF THIS ISSUE. HOWEVER VW USA HAS REFUSED TO RECALL NOR PAY TOWARDS THE REPAIR COST WHICH HAS BEEN QUOTED AT $800 BY THE DEALERSHIP.
